title: Green Animalist Party
text:
The Green Animalist Party (, acronym PVA) is a <a href="Uruguay">Uruguay</a>an <a href="Green%20conservatism">conservative</a> <a href="green%20party">green party</a> established in 2018, which places a particular emphasis on animal rights.
On 30 June 2019, its candidates took part in the primary elections and gained the right to participate in the <a href="2019%20Uruguayan%20general%20election">October general election</a>. Their presidential candidate will be Gustavo Salle, together with Enrique Viana.
